DOC.brief_title: Fetal Renal Artery Doppler Indices Borderline Isolated Oligohydramnios
DOC.detailed_description: During routine pregnancy examination 34-37 week gestation , fetus evaluate use ultrasound Toshiba Xario 200 3.5-megahertz probe . Fetal biometric measurement obtain placental structure amniotic fluid amount evaluate four quadrant . After detailed ultrasonography fetus , eligible pregnant woman include study . Borderline idiopathic isolate oligohydramnios define accord four quadrant technical ultrasound examination diagnose amniotic fluid index > 5.0 â‰¤8.0cm . After first ultrasound examination patient borderline isolated oligohydramnios group hydrate one two liter water daily . All patient monitor non stress test amniotic fluid index twice weekly delivery treatment hydration . For evaluate renal artery blood flow , axial image fetal abdomen obtain level fetal kidney . Using color flow Doppler , renal artery evaluate level origin abdominal aorta . The Doppler gate place within lumen straight segment vessel . A minimum three consecutive waveform use calculate PI . The umbilical artery Doppler measurement study free loop cord , far fetus placenta . pulsatile index resistance index value record . The study consist two group . The first group form patient normal amniotic volume meet inclusion criterion . In second group investigator include patient diagnose borderline idiopathic isolate oligohydramnios . After delivery investigator compare fetal renal artery doppler index neonatal outcomes group .
